channel.title: Projects on Mihail's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mihail's Portfolio

item.title: Filecoin IPC actors
item.description: This project aimed to migrate Filecoin actors to EVM contracts. The live repository can be found here I personally worked on: Developing production-ready code using Solidity Unit testing the actors using foundry Optimizing code for on-chain gas efficiency

item.title: Orchid Suites
item.description: This is a personal project automating AirBnb processes and giving people a seamless experience when booking a place to stay. Listings: Blue Orchid Green Orchid

item.title: Ubisoft's Assassins Creed Valhalla DLC
item.description: This project gave me the opportunity to work on a AAA game and gain these skills: Experience working in a big team on a large codebase with tight deadlines. Worked on prototyping, implementing, testing and debugging various features for the latest DLC I personally worked on: Main character skills and abilities Inventory Fight system Fixing various bugs for the game
